title: The Jacobite Trilogy: Flight of the Heron / Gleam in the North / Dark Mile
description: This trilogy comprises The Flight of the Heron, The Gleam in the North and The Dark Mile. Part love story, part adventure story, the trilogy is also a picture of a close-knit community embroiled in a civil war.The Flight of the Heron was first published by William Heinemann in 1925.The Gleam in the North was first published by William Heinemann in 1927.The Dark Mile was first published by William Heinemann in 1929.
author: D.K. Broster
